content:
I have a proposal for a bit of a reorg for SETTINGS > ORGANIZATION SETTINGS > Automated messages and emails (#25339). Thoughts?

To put the most commonly useful options at the top, and group all the automated messages and emails options together, we should rearrange SETTINGS > ORGANIZATION SETTINGS > Automated messages and emails to be the following:

  1. Language for automated messages and invitation emails
  2. New stream announcements
  3. New user announcements
  4. Allow message content in message notification emails [currently in Other settings]
  5. Send emails introducing Zulip to new users
  6. Send weekly digest emails to inactive users

Not marking as "help wanted" yet, pending discussion on CZO.
Yeah that order seems nice to me in concept; I'd want to make sure it looks visually reasonable too.
@Sahil Batra Would you be up for taking this one if it's quick?
Should be quick. Would open a PR by end of the day.
